channel.title: development on Legend of Code
channel.description: Recent content in development on Legend of Code

item.title: Hugo Theme Two
item.description: There doesn’t seem to be a lot of info out there about creating a theme in Hugo so I’ve been reading the docs to figure out how the various functions and variables work. So here’s a list of things I figured out while on a plane flying eight hours to attend my cousin’s wedding. New theme scaffolding hugo new theme fantasy This command creates a new theme called fantasy within the themes folder.

item.title: Writing my own Hugo theme
item.description: There’re billions upon billions of very well made themes for Hugo out there, so it’s a huge waste of my time to even attempt writing my own. Time that can be well spent working on Budgeteer or SnowboardGP or Kutsurogi or Okra or Libraga, and so on. I have so many ideas, all of them barely touched upon. I DO NOT HAVE THE THE TIME TO WRITE MY OWN THEME!
